AFTCoop 0.1.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Plot AFT Cooperative Cross-Validation Results

    plot_aft_coop.cv.Rd

    Internal function that creates a ggplot visualization of cross-validation results from an accelerated failure time (AFT) cooperative regularization model.

    plot_aft_coop.cv(cv.out, nfolds, case, addbar = F)

    Arguments

    cv.out

    List containing cross-validation results obtained by cv.coop , must include components:

    • cv.err.obj - Matrix of CV errors for each fold and lambda value

    • cv.err.linPred - Vector of mean CV errors for linear predictor

    • lambda_grid Numeric vector of lambda values used in the regularization path.

    • lambda.1se - Lambda value within 1 standard error of minimum CV error

    • lambda.min - Lambda value with minimum CV error

    • case.rho - Rho value for the current case

    nfolds

    Integer specifying the number of cross-validation folds used.

    case

    Character or numeric identifier for the current case being analyzed.

    addbar

    Logical to add error bar to the crossvalidation curve (Default FALSE)

    Value

    A ggplot object visualizing cross-validation results

    Details

    The function calculates standard errors for cross-validation error estimates and creates a visualization with error bars. It marks the lambda.min and lambda.1se values with vertical dashed lines. The object cv.err.obj is obtained using cv.coop

    Note

    Last change 15/04/2025
